io.odysz.semantic.syn

Class ExessionPersist

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.odysz.semantic.syn.ExessionPersist

  • public class ExessionPersist
extends Object
    Persisting exchange session with remote node, using temporary tables. This is a session context, and different from DBSyntext which is used for handling local data integration and database semantics.
    Author:
    Ody
